title: Luxury Studio 1 Bath in Midtown East- Available Now!- OR1
broker_fee: Broker fee equal to 1 month's rent.
posting_body: ['Luxury Studio 1 Bath in Midtown East', 'FINE-TUNED FEATURES', 'Our stylish apartment homes have been designed to surround you in comfort and luxury.', "You'll notice the difference in all the little things (like wine refrigerators in our kitchens) and especially the big things (like the stunning views through our large windows) and every single detail in between.", 'SLEEK KITCHENS', 'Soft close Italian oak and satin mirrored cabinetry with etched bronze hardware', 'Bosch stainless steel appliances', 'Marble Honed Calcutta Novus counter-tops with under mount, over-sized sink and polished chrome faucet', 'Built out pantry, utensil and waste drawers', 'SPACIOUS BATHROOMS', 'Honed Bianco Dolomite or textured white ceramic subway wall tile and slate honed hex floor tile', 'Custom Italian oak vanity with oil rubbed bronze hardware', 'Frost white countertops', 'Kohler sink and deep soaking tub with Moen polished chrome plumbing fixtures', 'LUXURIOUS DETAILS', 'Bosch washer & dryer', '5" white oak wood plank floors', 'Strategically installed convenience lighting', 'Custom closets designed by Organized Living', 'ENDLESS AMENITIES', 'Our amenity offerings provide luxurious spaces to savor every part of your day.', 'Two outdoor rooftop areas, a sleek penthouse lounge and our First Light fitness center all come complete with unforgettable views.', 'On our lower floor, yet another amenity suite offers delightful play spaces for children (and their discerning parents) including a stylish library, playhouse and arcade.', 'TOP LEVEL', 'Horizon Rooftop area with expansive panoramic views, sun beds and wrap-around lounge', 'Rise Penthouse lounge with a library, dining room and indoor/outdoor fireplace', 'First Light fitness center with cool down area', 'Outdoor kitchen with BBQ and seating', 'FOR THE KIDS', 'Rooster Pen playhouse with three separate entertainment areas including a TV Lounge and party room', 'Recreation room with a climbing wall', "Children's Library with books and seating", 'Vintage Arcade with game cabinets and foosball table', 'LOBBY & LOWER LEVELS', 'New Dawn lobby & Porte-cochère provide a warm welcome to residents & guests', 'Weight room and yoga studio', 'Pet spa', 'Bike and buggy storage', 'Additional laundry facility', 'For more information or similar listings, please contact:', 'Mike Agosto', '619-508-2712']
